actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Army to develop and implement a plan for modifying the channel bypass element of the Levisa Fork, Kentucky, for the purpose of water quality improvement in and restoration of Pikeville Lake, Kentucky.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to develop and implement a plan for modifying the channel bypass element of the Levisa Fork, Kentucky project, to improve water quality in and restore Pikeville Lake, Kentucky.

titles.title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Army to develop and implement a plan for modifying the channel bypass element of the Levisa Fork, Kentucky, for the purpose of water quality improvement in and restoration of Pikeville Lake, Kentucky.
